name: WiresharkFormatSwitchr
body:
### What is it
公司为了实现功能自动化，有些同事用Wireshark抓包的时候格式经常保存错误，并不是公司工具中所需要的Sniffer 2.00x类型的包，所以我写了个Python小程序，可以将任何Wireshark保存的capture类型转换成Sniffer 2.00x格式。

### Authors and Contributors
In 2016, 仲耀晖 (@tzattack) founded Wireshark Format Switcher.

### Support or Contact
Find me on Twitter and Weibo: @tzattack. My personal website: tzattackblog@wordpress.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
